name: getHttpContents
shortDescription: Returns the source of a web page.
description: This method returns the source of a web page as string. It was implemented to add the possibility to access web pages SSL encrypted on embedded systems when OpenSSL certificate verification is not working.
signatures: string getHttpContents(string $hostname, int $port, string $path, string $caFile, bool $verifyCertificate)

parameters.name: hostname
parameters.description: The hostname of the web server to get the source from.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number the web server listens on.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the file to return.

parameters.name: caFile
parameters.description: The path to the certificate file to verify the web server certificate against.

parameters.name: verifyCertificate
parameters.description: Enable certificate verification. Only disable this for testing purposes.

returnValue: Returns the source of the specified web page as string. Returns "false" on errors.
